product_name: Topeak BabySeat II with Disc Bike Rack
long_description: An innovative suspension, quick and secure rack attachment and customizable seating and harness make the Topeak BabySeatTM one of the best deals around. Disc-brake rear rack is included.
short_description: An innovative suspension, quick and secure rack attachment and customizable seating and harness make the Topeak BabySeatTM one of the best deals around. Disc-brake rear rack is included.
